Ok

what if we repost or try to repost a little, I don't have any 
problem but I should ask at Dishpanhandninja if he's agree. About 
Perceptor, he's my character and I let him do that shot. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: I'm going to have to disagree... partly... but to the same 
ends.  The 
> base part... alright yeah... that was moding... ignoring other 
people, bad 
> form though not technically moding.  As for the shots against 
Perceptor... He 
> is Airly's character thus it is her place to complain about them.  
Should she 
> desire to raise a complaint, that is her right.  It is no one 
else's place to 
> complain about it.  Trust me, if something is bothering Airly 
she'll let 
> someone know.
> 
>        That said, it is all rather moot because they shouldn't 
have been 
> inside the base to begin with.  In all honesty I don't have time 
right now to 
> figure out where they should be.  I'm going to leave that up to 
the 
> participants and/or the other members of the council to work out.  
I need to 
> go study for an AP test first thing tomorrow morning.  Good Night.
